options.error: Our device experiences blue screens and reboots after opening a certain number of applications
Our computer is experiencing flickering screens, flashing red lines, unexpected reboots, and strange patterns on the screen.
On our computer applications freeze, feel slow when used, and have blue screens
On our computer applications freeze, it does not find hardware, and it presents blue screens
In our equipment it does not start or give the start screen but the fans or other components sound

initMessages: Our central computer is failing, your task is to identify the part that is faulty.
